mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Through the activities carried out and with the support of individuals, legal entities, public and private institutions, we aim to contribute to the well-being of vulnerable communities in our society within the geographical scope of our social work.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: To be the social welfare entity that provides the greatest attention to the vulnerable population in our region, inspiring greater community participation in the execution of programs that ensure a better quality of life.
